text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ABCD$
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ABCD$
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $21$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $17$ units.
The length of the line $DE$ is $8$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
The line $BE$ is perpendicular to the line $ED$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $BD$, $CD$, $QC$, $BE$, $CE$, $DE$, forming the parallelogram $ABCD$.
The line $QC$ is a diagonal of the parallelogram $ABCD$.
The line $BE$ is a diagonal of the parallelogram $ABCD$.
The line $CE$ is a diagonal of the parallelogram $ABCD$.
